member.name: T:Atata.FindLastAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a control should use the last occurring element matching the control's definition.

member.name: T:Atata.FindSettingsAttribute
member.summary: Defines the settings to apply for the specified finding strategy of a control.

member.name: P:Atata.FindSettingsAttribute.FindAttributeType
member.summary: Gets the type of the attribute to use for the control finding. Type should be inherited from .

member.name: P:Atata.FindSettingsAttribute.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the control. The default value is -1, meaning that the index is not used.

member.name: P:Atata.FindSettingsAttribute.ScopeSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the scope source. The default value is Inherit.

member.name: P:Atata.FindSettingsAttribute.Strategy
member.summary: Gets or sets the strategy type for the control finding. Strategy type should implement . The default value is null, meaning that the default strategy of the specific should be used.

member.name: T:Atata.HoverParentAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the hover on the parent component should occur on the specified event. Be default occurs before any action. Is useful for the drop-down menu item controls.

member.name: T:Atata.InvokeMethodAttribute
member.summary: Defines the method to invoke on the specified event.

member.name: P:Atata.InvokeMethodAttribute.MethodName
member.summary: Gets the name of the method.

member.name: P:Atata.WaitForAttribute.Until
member.summary: Gets the waiting approach.

member.name: P:Atata.WaitForAttribute.ThrowOnPresenceFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to throw the exception on the presence (exists or visible) failure. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Atata.WaitForAttribute.ThrowOnAbsenceFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to throw the exception on the absence (missing or hidden) failure. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Atata.WaitForAttribute.PresenceTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the presence (exists or visible) timeout in seconds. The default value is taken from AtataContext.Current.RetryTimeout.TotalSeconds.

member.name: P:Atata.WaitForAttribute.AbsenceTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the absence (missing or hidden) timeout in seconds. The default value is taken from AtataContext.Current.RetryTimeout.TotalSeconds.

member.name: P:Atata.WaitForAttribute.RetryInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the retry interval. The default value is taken from AtataContext.Current.RetryInterval.TotalSeconds.

member.name: T:Atata.DateTime`1
member.summary: Represents any element containing date and time content. Default search is performed by the label. The default format is "g" (general date/time pattern (short time), e.g. 6/15/2009 1:45 PM).
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.Time`1
member.summary: Represents any element containing time content. Default search is performed by the label.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.Date`1
member.summary: Represents any element containing date content. Default search is performed by the label. The default format is "d" (short date pattern, e.g. 6/15/2009).
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.Currency`1
member.summary: Represents any element containing currency content. Default search is performed by the label. The default format is "C2" (e.g. $123.45).
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.Number`1
member.summary: Represents any element containing number content. Default search is performed by the label.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: P:Atata.AtataBuildingContext.TestName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the test.

member.name: P:Atata.AtataBuildingContext.BaseUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the base URL.

member.name: P:Atata.AtataBuildingContext.RetryTimeout
member.summary: Gets the retry timeout. The default value is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Atata.AtataBuildingContext.RetryInterval
member.summary: Gets the retry interval. The default value is 500 milliseconds.

member.summary: Sets the base URL.

member.name: M:Atata.AtataContextBuilder.UseRetryTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the retry timeout for a search of element/control. The default value is 10 seconds.

member.name: M:Atata.AtataContextBuilder.UseRetryInterval(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the retry interval for a search of element/control. The default value is 500 milliseconds.

member.summary: Sets up the context.

member.summary: Allows to access the component scope element's attribute values.

member.summary: Gets the instance for the value of the specified control's scope element attribute.
member.returns: The instance for the attribute's current value.

member.summary: Gets the value of the specified control's scope element attribute.

member.summary: Allows to access the component scope element's CSS property values.

member.returns: The instance for the CSS property's current value.

member.name: M:Atata.UIComponentCssProvider`1.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified control's scope element CSS property.
member.param: The name of the CSS property.

member.summary: Gets the number.

member.name: M:Atata.LogManager.EndSection

member.name: T:Atata.ControlFindingAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the default finding strategy of a control. Can be applied to the control class and assembly.

member.name: P:Atata.ControlFindingAttribute.FindAttributeType
member.summary: Gets the type of the attribute to use for the control finding. Type should be inherited from .

member.name: P:Atata.ControlFindingAttribute.ControlType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the control (e.g.: typeof(LinkControl<>), typeof(EditableField<,>)).

member.name: P:Atata.ControlFindingAttribute.ParentComponentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the parent component.

member.name: T:Atata.CultureAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the culture of a component.

member.name: P:Atata.CultureAttribute.Value
member.summary: Gets the culture value.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByAttributeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the specified attribute. Finds the control that has the specified attribute matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByChildContentAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the child content text. Finds the control having the child with the specified content. Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: P:Atata.FindByChildContentAttribute.ChildIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the child element. The default value is 0.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByClassAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by class attribute. Finds the descendant or self control in the scope of the element having the specified class. Uses Kebab as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByColumnHeaderAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found within the table column (<td>) that has the header (<th>) matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByColumnIndexAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found within the table column (<td>) that has the nth index.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByContentOrValueAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the content text or value attribute. Finds the control that has the content or value attribute matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByCssAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by CSS selector. Finds the descendant or self control in the scope of the element found by the specified CSS selector.

member.name: P:Atata.FindByCssAttribute.Values
member.summary: Gets the CSS selector values.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByDescriptionTermAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the description list term element. Finds the descendant control of the <dd> element in the scope of the <dl> element that has the <dt> element matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByFieldSetAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the parent fieldset element. Finds the descendant control in the scope of the <fieldset> element that has the <legend> element matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByIndexAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should use the nth occurring element matching the control's definition.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByNameAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by name attribute. Finds the descendant or self control in the scope of the element having the specified name. Uses Kebab as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByPlaceholderAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the placeholder attribute. Finds the control that has the placeholder attribute matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByTitleAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the title attribute. Finds the control that has the title attribute matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByValueAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the value attribute. Finds the control that has the value attribute matching the specified term(s). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByXPathAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by XPath. Finds the descendant or self control in the scope of the element found by the specified XPath.

member.name: P:Atata.FindByXPathAttribute.Values
member.summary: Gets the XPath values.

member.name: T:Atata.FindFirstAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a control should use the first occurring element matching the control's definition.

member.name: T:Atata.FormatAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the format of a control.

member.name: P:Atata.FormatAttribute.Value
member.summary: Gets the format value.

member.name: T:Atata.ItemsControl`2
member.summary: Represents the items control (a set of any control of TItem type).
member.typeparam: The type of the item control.
The type of the owner page object.

member.name: P:Atata.ItemsControl`2.Items
member.summary: Gets the items' ControlList.

member.name: T:Atata.TableHeader`1
member.summary: Represents the table header cell control (<th>).
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.Table`3
member.summary: Represents the table control (<table>). Default search finds the first occurring table.
member.typeparam: The type of the table header control.
The type of the table row control.
The type of the owner page object.

member.name: P:Atata.Table`3.Rows
member.summary: Gets the rows list.

member.name: P:Atata.Table`3.Headers
member.summary: Gets the headers list.

member.name: T:Atata.PasswordInput`1
member.summary: Represents the password input control (<input type="password">). Default search is performed by the label.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.summary: Output a given expression tree to a string.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByIdAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by id attribute. Finds the descendant or self control in the scope of the element having the specified id. Uses Kebab as the default term case.

member.name: P:Atata.FindByIdAttribute.DefaultCase
member.summary: Gets the default term case. The default value is TermCase.Kebab.

member.name: T:Atata.ClickParentAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the click on the parent component should occur on the specified event. Be default occurs before any action. Is useful for the drop-down button/menu controls.

member.name: T:Atata.CloseAlertBoxAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the alert box should be closed on the specified event. Be default occurs after the click.

member.name: T:Atata.CloseConfirmBoxAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the confirm box should be closed on the specified event. Be default occurs after the click. By default accepts the confirm box.

member.name: T:Atata.LogInfoAttribute
member.summary: Defines the information message to be logged on the specified event.

member.name: T:Atata.PressEnterAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the Enter key should be pressed on the specified event. By default occurs after the set.

member.name: T:Atata.PressTabAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the Tab key should be pressed on the specified event. By default occurs after the set.

member.name: T:Atata.ScreenshotAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the screenshot should be captured with an optional title. By default occurs before the click.

member.name: T:Atata.ScrollDownAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the scroll down should be performed on the specified event. By default occurs before any action.

member.name: T:Atata.ScrollUpAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the scroll up should be performed on the specified event. By default occurs before any action.

member.name: T:Atata.PressKeysAttribute
member.summary: Defines the keys to press on the specified event. By default occurs after the set.

member.name: T:Atata.TermVerificationTriggerAttribute
member.summary: The base trigger attribute class that can be used in the verification process when the page object is initialized.

member.name: T:Atata.TriggerAttribute
member.summary: Represents the base attribute class for the triggers.

member.name: P:Atata.TriggerAttribute.On
member.summary: Gets or sets the trigger events.

member.name: P:Atata.TriggerAttribute.Priority
member.summary: Gets or sets the priority. The default value is Medium.

member.name: P:Atata.TriggerAttribute.AppliesTo
member.summary: Gets or sets the scope to apply the trigger to. The default value is Self.

member.name: P:Atata.TriggerAttribute.IsDefinedAtComponentLevel
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this trigger is defined at the component level.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyContentMatchesAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the page content. Verifies whether the component content matches any of the specified values. By default occurs upon the page object initialization.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyContentAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the page content. Verifies whether the component contains the specified content values. By default occurs upon the page object initialization.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyExistsAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the component should be verified whether it exists on the specified event. By default occurs upon the page object initialization.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH1Attribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the <h1> element content. By default occurs upon the page object initialization. If no value is specified, it uses the class name as the expected value with the TermCase.Title casing applied.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH2Attribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the <h2> element content. By default occurs upon the page object initialization. If no value is specified, it uses the class name as the expected value with the TermCase.Title casing applied.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH3Attribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the <h3> element content. By default occurs upon the page object initialization. If no value is specified, it uses the class name as the expected value with the TermCase.Title casing applied.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH4Attribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the <h4> element content. By default occurs upon the page object initialization. If no value is specified, it uses the class name as the expected value with the TermCase.Title casing applied.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH5Attribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the <h5> element content. By default occurs upon the page object initialization. If no value is specified, it uses the class name as the expected value with the TermCase.Title casing applied.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyH6Attribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the <h6> element content. By default occurs upon the page object initialization. If no value is specified, it uses the class name as the expected value with the TermCase.Title casing applied.

member.name: P:Atata.VerifyHeadingTriggerAttribute.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of header. The default value is -1, meaning that the index is not used.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyMissingAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the component should be verified whether it is missing on the specified event. By default occurs upon the page object initialization.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyTitleAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the verification of the page title. By default occurs upon the page object initialization. If no value is specified, it uses the class name as the expected value with the TermCase.Title casing applied.

member.name: T:Atata.VerifyTitleSettingsAttribute
member.summary: Defines the settings to apply for the trigger.

member.name: T:Atata.WaitAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the waiting period in seconds. By default occurs after any action.

member.name: T:Atata.WaitForElementAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the waiting for the element. By default occurs after the click.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Atata.FindAttribute
member.summary: Represents the base attribute class for the finding attributes.

member.name: P:Atata.FindAttribute.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the control. The default value is -1, meaning that the index is not used.

member.name: P:Atata.FindAttribute.ScopeSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the scope source. The default value is Inherit.

member.name: P:Atata.FindAttribute.Strategy
member.summary: Gets or sets the strategy type for the control search. Strategy type should implement . The default value is null, meaning that the default strategy of the specific should be used.

member.name: P:Atata.FindAttribute.DefaultStrategy
member.summary: Gets the default strategy type for the control search. Strategy type should implement .

member.name: T:Atata.FindByContentAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the content text. Finds the control having the specified content. Uses Title as the default term case.

member.name: T:Atata.FindByLabelAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a control should be found by the label element. Finds the <label> element by the specified term(s), then finds the bound control (for example, by label's "for" attribute referencing the element of the control by id). Uses Title as the default term case.

member.summary: Defines the format to apply for the specified control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the control (e.g.: typeof(DateInput<>), typeof(TimeInput<>)).

member.name: P:Atata.FormatSettingsAttribute.Value
member.summary: Gets the format value.

member.summary: Navigates forward to the next page.

member.param: The instance of the next page object. If equals null, creates an instance of using the default constructor.
member.returns: The instance of the next page object.

member.name: M:Atata.PageObject`1.CloseWindow
member.summary: Closes the current window.

member.name: M:Atata.PageObject`1.Wait(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Waits the specified time.
member.returns: The instance of this page object.

member.name: M:Atata.PageObject`1.Wait(System.Double)
member.summary: Waits the specified time in seconds.
member.param: The time to wait in seconds.
member.returns: The instance of this page object.

member.name: T:Atata.TriggerEvents
member.summary: Specifies the trigger events.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.None
member.summary: None of the events.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.Init
member.summary: Occurs upon the page object initialization.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.DeInit
member.summary: Occurs upon the page object de-initialization.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.BeforeGet
member.summary: Occurs before the value is taken from the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.AfterGet
member.summary: Occurs after the value is taken from the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.BeforeSet
member.summary: Occurs before the value is set to the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.AfterSet
member.summary: Occurs after the value is set to the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.BeforeClick
member.summary: Occurs before the click on the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.AfterClick
member.summary: Occurs after the click on the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.BeforeHover
member.summary: Occurs before the hover on the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.AfterHover
member.summary: Occurs after the hover on the control.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.BeforeFocus
member.summary: Occurs before the control gets the focus.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerEvents.AfterFocus
member.summary: Occurs after the control gets the focus.

member.name: T:Atata.TriggerPriority
member.summary: Specifies the priority of the trigger execution.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerPriority.Highest
member.summary: The highest priority.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerPriority.Higher
member.summary: The higher priority.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerPriority.High
member.summary: The high priority.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerPriority.Medium
member.summary: The medium priority.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerPriority.Low
member.summary: The low priority.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerPriority.Lower
member.summary: The lower priority.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerPriority.Lowest
member.summary: The lowest priority.

member.name: T:Atata.TriggerScope
member.summary: Specifies the scope of the trigger application.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerScope.Self
member.summary: Indicates that the trigger applies to the class/member declared.

member.name: F:Atata.TriggerScope.Children
member.summary: Indicates that the trigger applies to the child control properties.

member.name: T:Atata.TermCase
member.summary: Specifies the term case.

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Inherit
member.summary: Uses the inherited case or none if missing.

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.None
member.summary: Doesn't apply the case.

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Title
member.summary: Uses title case (e.g. "Some Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Sentence
member.summary: Uses sentence case (e.g. "Some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.MidSentence
member.summary: Uses mid-sentence case where the first word is not capitalised (e.g. "some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Lower
member.summary: Uses lower case (e.g. "some term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.LowerMerged
member.summary: Uses lower case with words merging (e.g. "someterm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Upper
member.summary: Uses upper case (e.g. "SOME TERM").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.UpperMerged
member.summary: Uses upper case with words merging (e.g. "SOMETERM").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Camel
member.summary: Uses camel case (e.g. "someTerm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Pascal
member.summary: Uses pascal case (e.g. "SomeTerm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Kebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-') and lower case (e.g. "some-term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.HyphenKebab
member.summary: Uses hyphen ('') and lower case (e.g. "someterm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.PascalKebab
member.summary: Uses dash ('-') and pascal case (e.g. "Some-Term").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.PascalHyphenKebab
member.summary: Uses hyphen ('') and pascal case (e.g. "SomeTerm").

member.name: F:Atata.TermCase.Snake
member.summary: Uses undersore ('_') and lower case (e.g. "some_term").

member.name: T:Atata.TermMatch
member.summary: Specifies the match approach for the term finding.

member.name: F:Atata.TermMatch.Inherit
member.summary: Uses the inherited match or the default one.

member.name: F:Atata.TermMatch.Contains
member.summary: Checks whether the text contains the specified term.

member.name: F:Atata.TermMatch.Equals
member.summary: Checks whether the text equals the specified term.

member.name: F:Atata.TermMatch.StartsWith
member.summary: Checks whether the text starts with the specified term.

member.name: F:Atata.TermMatch.EndsWith
member.summary: Checks whether the text ends with the specified term.

member.name: T:Atata.TextInput`1
member.summary: Represents the text input control (<input type="text">). Default search is performed by the label. Handles any input element with type="text" or without the defined type attribute.
member.typeparam: The type of the owner page object.

member.name: T:Atata.WaitBy
member.summary: Specifies the kind of the element selector for the waiting.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitBy.Id
member.summary: Uses the id selector kind.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitBy.Name
member.summary: Uses the name selector kind.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitBy.Class
member.summary: Uses the class selector kind.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitBy.Css
member.summary: Uses the CSS selector kind.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitBy.XPath
member.summary: Uses the XPath selector kind.

member.name: T:Atata.WaitUntil
member.summary: Specifies the waiting approach.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.Missing
member.summary: Waits until the element will be missing.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.Hidden
member.summary: Waits until the element will be hidden.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.MissingOrHidden
member.summary: Waits until the element will be missing or hidden.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.Visible
member.summary: Waits until the element will be visible.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.Exists
member.summary: Waits until the element will exist.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.VisibleAndHidden
member.summary: Waits until the element will be visible and than until it will be hidden.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.VisibleAndMissing
member.summary: Waits until the element will be visible and than until it will be missing.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.MissingAndVisible
member.summary: Waits until the element will be missing and than until it will be visible.

member.name: F:Atata.WaitUntil.HiddenAndVisible
member.summary: Waits until the element will be hidden and than until it will be visible.
